name: react-split-view
description: A split view component for React, shows two or more subviews, separated by a draggable divider.

scripts.demo: npm run compile && browserify demo/Example.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.demo:watch: npm run compile:watch & watchify demo/Example.js -d -t -o demo/bundle.js
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run compile && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
